description: What is the point of this app? It doesn't do anything, just shows that flatpaks can access system resources like files and printers. But we all knew that already. Many of us have real software installed as flatpaks that do all that stuff and a lot more. I really don't see the point of this app.
This does nothing. It tells you that there are flatpaks on here... didnt we know that?
You don't understand the importance of this app! It is great revolution! Keep it up guys!
